title: BIP 31: Revenue Management Part II
body:
TLDR; A less intrusive diversification model. Numbers you can play with. Some calls to action surrounding new revenue stream ideas. Diversification. Goal Directed Revenue.

Results:
- Do not cancel 1 time diversification event
- 15% recurring diversification
- 50.3%/49.7% USDC / ETH

Discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-31-revenue-management-part-ii/2564
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
